name: Triangrid
description:
You are... somewhere.

Things will happen, maybe?

According to this passage in LevelUp (A book by scott rogers about game design (it's alright)) it is a game. do not ask me whether or not this is a game, i won't talk to you about it. it is a game

All right? this is a game.

Many people can play this game. you can play it alone, you could play it with a hundred people, I guess? You can play more or less any game with a hundred people, if you're willing to bend the rules enough.
Games are stupid,, sorry, moreso, definitions are stupid. i'm on a tangent. this is a game

this is my longest game, by virtue of waiting. you shouldn't play this game for any longer than you want to. maybe turn on some music in the background, on a seperate device, so you may pause it if you wish. 

if the game doesn't work, i'm sorry, but it probably just doesn't like you. it's your fault, and you should feel ashamed. not if you're using mac though, i just haven't made a mac build because i'm not sure how. i promise one day i will make mac builds of all my games. sorry.

 Wait!! There's a mac build now. haha, sorry.
